entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
